languages.text: "Нервы расшалились!" {n} — фыркает Идира. Но затем хмурится и говорит куда серьезнее:{/n} "Что-то мне покоя не дает наша святоша, а своему чутью я верю. Вроде прямая она как палка и понятная как похмелье после пьянки, ан нет, как смотрю на нее — свербит что-то".

"It was just my nerves playing up!" {n}Idira snorts. But then she frowns and continues more seriously,{/n} "Something about our little saint doesn't sit right with me, and I trust my gut. Oh sure, she seems straight as an arrow and as predictable as a hangover after drinking, but when I look at her — something about her makes my brain itch."
languages.original_text: "Нервы расшалились!" {n} — фыркает Идира. Но затем хмурится и говорит куда серьезнее:{/n} "Что-то мне покоя не дает наша святоша, а своему чутью я верю. Вроде прямая она как палка и понятная как похмелье после пьянки, ан нет, как смотрю на нее — свербит что-то".

But then she frowns and continues more seriously,{/n} "Something about our little saint doesn't sit right with me, and I trust my gut. Oh sure, she seems straight as an arrow and as predictable as a hangover after drinking, but when I look at her — something about her makes my brain itch."

languages.text: “那只是我在发神经而已！”{n}伊迪拉哼了一声，但随后又皱起了眉头，以更加严肃的语气继续说道。{/n}“咱们的小圣女有些地方让我感觉不太对劲儿，我相信我的直觉。噢，当然，她看起来就像箭一样直，而且就像宿醉一样从不会让人意外，但每当我看着她的时候——都会感觉她身上的某些东西让我脑子发痒。”
languages.original_text: "It was just my nerves playing up!" {n}Idira snorts. But then she frowns and continues more seriously,{/n} "Something about our little saint doesn't sit right with me, and I trust my gut. Oh sure, she seems straight as an arrow and as predictable as a hangover after drinking, but when I look at her — something about her makes my brain itch."

traits.locale_text: “那只是我在发神经而已！”{n}伊迪拉哼了一声，但随后又皱起了眉头，以更加严肃的语气继续说道。{/n}“咱们的小圣女有些地方让我感觉不太对劲儿，我相信我的直觉。噢，当然，她看起来就像箭一样直，而且就像宿醉一样从不会让人意外，但每当我看着她的时候——都会感觉她身上的某些东西让我脑子发痒。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "It was just my nerves playing up!" {n}Idira snorts. But then she frowns and continues more seriously,{/n} "Something about our little saint doesn't sit right with me, and I trust my gut. Oh sure, she seems straight as an arrow and as predictable as a hangover after drinking, but when I look at her — something about her makes my brain itch."

languages.text: «¡Es que estaba nerviosa!». {n}Idira se ríe, pero después frunce el ceño y continúa con seriedad. {/n} «Algo no me cuadra con respecto a nuestra santurrona, y yo me fío de mi instinto. Sí, sí, parece totalmente íntegra y tan predecible como una resaca después de la borrachera, pero, al mirarla... algo en ella hace que me pique el cerebro».
languages.original_text: "It was just my nerves playing up!" {n}Idira snorts. But then she frowns and continues more seriously,{/n} "Something about our little saint doesn't sit right with me, and I trust my gut. Oh sure, she seems straight as an arrow and as predictable as a hangover after drinking, but when I look at her — something about her makes my brain itch."

traits.locale_text: «¡Es que estaba nerviosa!». {n}Idira se ríe, pero después frunce el ceño y continúa con seriedad. {/n} «Algo no me cuadra con respecto a nuestra santurrona, y yo me fío de mi instinto. Sí, sí, parece totalmente íntegra y tan predecible como una resaca después de la borrachera, pero, al mirarla... algo en ella hace que me pique el cerebro».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「神経が高ぶっていただけよ！」{n}イディラは鼻で笑った。しかし、彼女は顔をしかめ、さらに真剣にこう続けた。{/n}「我らが小さな聖女について、どうにもしっくりこないことがあるの。そして、あたいは自分の直感を信じているわ。確かに、彼女は矢のようにまっすぐで、酒を飲んだ後の二日酔いのように予想がつきやすいわよね。でも、彼女を見ていると…その何かが、あたいの脳を疼かせるの」
languages.original_text: "It was just my nerves playing up!" {n}Idira snorts. But then she frowns and continues more seriously,{/n} "Something about our little saint doesn't sit right with me, and I trust my gut. Oh sure, she seems straight as an arrow and as predictable as a hangover after drinking, but when I look at her — something about her makes my brain itch."

traits.locale_text: 「神経が高ぶっていただけよ！」{n}イディラは鼻で笑った。しかし、彼女は顔をしかめ、さらに真剣にこう続けた。{/n}「我らが小さな聖女について、どうにもしっくりこないことがあるの。そして、あたいは自分の直感を信じているわ。確かに、彼女は矢のようにまっすぐで、酒を飲んだ後の二日酔いのように予想がつきやすいわよね。でも、彼女を見ていると…その何かが、あたいの脳を疼かせるの」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Meine Nerven haben einfach verrückt gespielt!" {n}Idira schnaubt auf. Doch dann runzelt sie die Stirn und fährt in ernsterem Ton fort: {/n}"Irgendwas an unserer kleinen Heiligen gefällt mir nicht, und ich vertraue meinem Bauchgefühl. Gewiss, sie wirkt vollkommen geradlinig und so vorhersehbar wie ein Kater nach einer durchzechten Nacht, doch wenn ich sie mir ansehe ... fängt mein Gehirn an zu kribbeln."
languages.original_text: "It was just my nerves playing up!" {n}Idira snorts. But then she frowns and continues more seriously,{/n} "Something about our little saint doesn't sit right with me, and I trust my gut. Oh sure, she seems straight as an arrow and as predictable as a hangover after drinking, but when I look at her — something about her makes my brain itch."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Nerven haben einfach verrückt gespielt!" {n}Idira schnaubt auf. Doch dann runzelt sie die Stirn und fährt in ernsterem Ton fort: {/n}"Irgendwas an unserer kleinen Heiligen gefällt mir nicht, und ich vertraue meinem Bauchgefühl. Gewiss, sie wirkt vollkommen geradlinig und so vorhersehbar wie ein Kater nach einer durchzechten Nacht, doch wenn ich sie mir ansehe ... fängt mein Gehirn an zu kribbeln."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « C'est juste mes nerfs qui ont lâché ! » {n}Idira pousse avec un grognement de frustration, puis elle fronce les sourcils et reprend sur un ton plus sérieux.{/n} « Je fais confiance à mon instinct, et mon instinct me dit que quelque chose cloche chez notre petite sainte nitouche. Oh, pour sûr, elle a l'air droite dans ses bottes et elle est aussi prévisible qu'une gueule de bois après une nuit de beuverie, mais quand je la regarde, j'ai le cerveau qui me démange. »
languages.original_text: "It was just my nerves playing up!" {n}Idira snorts. But then she frowns and continues more seriously,{/n} "Something about our little saint doesn't sit right with me, and I trust my gut. Oh sure, she seems straight as an arrow and as predictable as a hangover after drinking, but when I look at her — something about her makes my brain itch."

traits.locale_text: « C'est juste mes nerfs qui ont lâché ! » {n}Idira pousse avec un grognement de frustration, puis elle fronce les sourcils et reprend sur un ton plus sérieux.{/n} « Je fais confiance à mon instinct, et mon instinct me dit que quelque chose cloche chez notre petite sainte nitouche. Oh, pour sûr, elle a l'air droite dans ses bottes et elle est aussi prévisible qu'une gueule de bois après une nuit de beuverie, mais quand je la regarde, j'ai le cerveau qui me démange. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Sinirim tepeme çıktı da ondan!" {n}İdira homurdanıyor. Ardından kaşlarını çatıyor, sesi de daha bir ciddileşiyor.{/n} "Minik azizemizde içime sinmeyen bir şeyler var. Kaldı ki ben içgüdülerime güvenirim. Elbette dürüstlüğüne şüphe yok. Yapacaklarını öngörmekse içki sonrası mahmurluğu tahmin etmek kadar kolay. Fakat ona her baktığımda zihnimde birkaç tel atıyor."
languages.original_text: "It was just my nerves playing up!" {n}Idira snorts. But then she frowns and continues more seriously,{/n} "Something about our little saint doesn't sit right with me, and I trust my gut. Oh sure, she seems straight as an arrow and as predictable as a hangover after drinking, but when I look at her — something about her makes my brain itch."

traits.locale_text: "Biraz sinirlerim gerildi, ondandır!" {n}İdira homurdanıyor. Ardından kaşlarını çatarak daha ciddi bir ses tonuyla devam ediyor.{/n} "Minik azizimize dair bir şeyler içime sinmiyor ve ben içgüdülerime güvenirim. Elbette dürüstlüğüne şüphe yok. Yapacaklarını öngörmekse içki sonrası mahmurluğu tahmin etmek kadar kolay. Ardından ona bir bakıyorum ve zihnimde fırtınalar kopuyor."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
